name: emarsys-timezones
description: Provides timezones to use in the products of Emarsys

scripts.release-patch: npm version patch -m 'chore(package): update version to %s'
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor -m 'chore(package): update version to %s'
scripts.release-major: npm version major -m 'chore(package): update version to %s'

author: Emarsys
